She earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Emelie is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Emelie has been in pig fattening for 5 years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Elizabeth works hard to support her family.

She has a business of selling mobile phone sim cards in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase more stock of mobile phone sim cards to sell.

Elizabeth has been sustaining her business activities through her past 4 loans from NWTF. 

She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of mobile phone sim cards to sell.

loans.name: Zaituni

texts.en:
Zaituni is a married mother of five children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and household consumables.

For over 16 years, she has operated an open air food selling business, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of business. 

With the Kshs 20,000 she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves and cooking fat. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves and cooking fat.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es: Victor de 31 años de edad se dedica a la pesca artesanal desde hace varios años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su casa, con las ganancias que obtiene logra salir adelante con su familia, vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 12 y 10 años de edad, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de trasmayos para la pesca  y así poder continuar con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
Victor is 31 years old. He has made a living as a fisherman for several years. He markets his products in various markets that are close to home. With the earnings he obtains, he achieves success for his family. He lives in his own house with his wife and two children, aged 12 and 10 years old.

He is asking for a loan to buy trammel nets for fishing so he continue his work, as this is his only form of income.

loans.use: to buy trammel nets for fishing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, galvanized sheet metal, wood and iron so she can finish construction of a basin and repair her roof.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
La socia Gregoria se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de queso y también la socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de agricultura, la socia tiene un terreno donde cultiva maíz y papa, la socia es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora y por medio de este negocio la socia quiere sacar adelante a su familia. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes para su terreno de cultivo.



La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Gregoria continues to sell cheese and farm. She has a plot of land where she grows corn and potatoes. She is an enterprising and hardworking woman who wants to get her family ahead by means of her business. Gregoria is requesting a loan to buy seeds and fertilizer for her plot of land. She is happy about the loan and she promises to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for her plot of land.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
La socia  Lucila  se sigue dedicando al negocio de agricultura, la socia tiene un terreno donde cultiva maíz y papa, la socia es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora y por medio de este negocio la socia quiere sacar adelante a su familia. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes para su terreno de cultivo.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower, Lucila, continues making a living in the agriculture business.  She has a field where she grows corn and potatoes.  She is an enterprising and hardworking woman; and through his business, she wants to get her family ahead. 

Lucila is requesting the loan to buy seeds and fertilizers for her field.  She is happy for the loan and promises to comply with the payments.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizers for her field.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
La socia  Antonia   se sigue dedicando al negocio de agricultura, ella tiene un terreno donde cultiva maiz y papa, , la socia es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora y por medio de este negocio la socia quiere sacar adelante a su familia. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes para su terreno de cultivo.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Antonia continues earning her living in agriculture.  She has a plot of land where she grows corn and potatoes.  She is an enterprising and hard-working woman.  Through her business, she hopes to get her family ahead. Antonia is requesting this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizers for her farmland. 
Antonia is happy about the loan and she promises to comply with her established repayment plan.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer for her farmland.

loans.name: Paulino

texts.es:
El socio Paulino se dedica al negocio de agricultura y ganaderia, el socio es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante,el sueño del socio es ampliar el terreno de cultivo. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar semillas,herramientas y fertilizantes.


El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower, Paulino, makes a living through his agriculture and livestock business.   He is a hardworking and enterprising person, who through this business, wants to get ahead.  His dream is to expand his fields.

Paulino is requesting the loan to buy seeds, tools, and fertilizers.  He is happy about the loan and promises to comply with the repayment terms.

loans.use: To buy seeds, tools, and fertilizers.

loans.name: Merlina

texts.en:
Merlina is a married woman with six children, four of whom are currently in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Merlina is 37 years old.

Merlina has a bamboo stripes weaving business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 18000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more bamboo for her business.

Merlina has been in this business for 5 years. In the future, Merlina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more bamboo for her business

loans.name: Rosa Vilma

texts.es:
Rosa, de 43 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está acompañada y su pareja es agricultor en pequeño, no tienen hijos.

Rosa, tiene una pequeña tienda desde hace 1 año y una venta de pupusas desde hace 5 meses.- Anteriormente, realizaba trabajos domésticos y no tenía muchos ingresos, fue por esa razón que decidió comenzar con este tipo de negocios, en el horario de 7:00 a.m. a 7:00 p.m. todos los días abre la tienda y las pupusas solo las vende los fines de semana. 

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar granos básicos para la tienda y comprar harina, aceite y carne para hacer las pupusas. 

Rosa, sueña con un negocio más grande y sueña con tener una pupusería donde pueda vender por grandes cantidades.
texts.en:
Rosa, 43 years old, studied until ninth grade.  She married and he partner is small farmer.  They do not have children.

Rosa has had a small store for one year and a has been selling pupusas (thick tortillas filled with cheese, meat, or beans) for the past five months.  Previously, she did housework and did not have much income.  It was for that reason that she decided to begin this type of business.  With a schedule from 7:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m., everyday she opens the store, and she only sells the pupusas on the weekends.

She is requesting the loan to buy basic grains for the store and to buy flour, oil, and meat to make pupusas.

Rosa dreams of making her business bigger and of having a pupusa stall where she can sell in bigger quantities.

loans.use: To buy basic grains for the store and to buy flour, oil and meat to make pupusas.

loans.name: Maria Bernarda

texts.es: Maria de 57 años de edad desde hace 7 años se dedica a la venta de quesadillas y tamales, su negocio está ubicado en su casa pero también vende de manera ambulante por las diferentes colonias, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Maria vive en casa propia con su esposo, su hijo, su nuera y sus dos nietos, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de harina, azúcar, huevos, etc. y así poder seguir con su trabajo para poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Maris is 57 years old.  For the past seven years, she has made a living selling quesadillas and tamales.  Her business is located in her home, but she also sells in the streets in different neighborhoods.  With what she makes from her sales and with the help of her husband, they manage to cover some of their household expenses.  Maria lives in her own house with her husband, her son, her daughter-in-law, and her two grandchildren.

She is requesting a loan to buy flour, sugar, eggs, etc., and, therefore, be able to continue her job in order to have better income.

loans.use: To buy flour, sugar, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Ángela de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la confección de ropa desde hace 10 años, su taller de costura lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia y posee muchos clientes por la calidad con que realiza la ropa, Ángela está solicitando un crédito para la compra de hilos, agujas, variedad de tela, botones, elásticos, etc. y así poder continuar con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
Ángela, 47 years old, lives in her own house with her husband.  She has made a living making clothing for the past ten years.  Her sewing shop is located in her place of residence.  She has a lot of clients for the quality with which she makes the clothing.  

Ángela is requesting the loan to buy thread, needles, a variety of fabric, buttons, elastic, etc., and, thus, be able to continue her job that makes her good profit.

loans.use: To buy thread, needles, a variety of fabric, buttons, elastic, etc.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
La socia Alicia se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes , la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y galletas, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante, la socia es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, azúcar, leche y galletas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member still has her grocery store business. She sells basic household goods such as rice, sugar, milk and cookies. By having this business, she hopes to get ahead. She is an enterprising and hard-working woman. 

Her dream is for her grocery store business to grow. She is requesting the loan to buy rice, sugar, milk, and cookies. She is happy to have the loan and is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk and cookies.

loans.name: Tungini Group

texts.en:
Kibibi, who is in her mid 20s is single with two children. One child is in school and the other one is still young. She has been running two projects, selling charcoal and a genge (grocery store) business for three months now. She works from 7am to 7pm daily and is able to make a a good monthly profit.

This will be Kibibi's second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to increase her charcoal and to start the genge business. She is doing fine and has repaid her loan successfully. She used the profit to pay school fees, make her loan repayment and cover household expenses. She will use this loan to buy sacks of charcoal to resell. She dreams of building her own house.

Kibibi will share this loan with her loan group, Tungini, which consists of nine members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal to resell.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys has a retail shop in Kabarnet town and has been in this business for 8 years. She is 28 years old and a single mother of 3 children.

She has requested a loan from Vision Fund Kenya and will use it to buy more stocks of goods such as rice, flour and sugar to sell.

She will use the anticipated profits to improve the living standards of her family. In future she hopes to grow her business and be able to educate her children and improve her family’s living standards.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of goods to sell.

loans.name: María De La Cruz

texts.es:
María, de 35 años de edad, estudio hasta cuarto grado, está acompañada y su pareja es agricultor, tiene 3 hijos, dos de ellos están estudiando.

María, tiene 12 años de tener una tienda en su casa, aprendió a administrarla gracias a su madre, ella viaja una vez por semana al centro a comprar los productos para la venta y abre su tienda de 7:00 a.m. y cierra a las 6:00 p.m.

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar bebidas, galletas y golosinas, pues tiene cerca de una escuela. 

El sueño de María es seguir trabajando en la tienda y hacerla más grande, además desea que sus hijos sigan estudiando hasta que sean profesionales.
texts.en:
María is 35 years old and has a 4th grade education. She is married and her partner works in agriculture. She has 3 children, 2 of which are in school.

María has had a store in her house for 12 years. She learned to run it thanks to her mother. María travels once a week to the city center to buy products to sell. She opens her store at 7:00 a.m. and closes at 6:00 p.m.

María needs this loan to buy beverages, crackers, and snacks since her store is near a school. Her dream is to continue working in her store and to make it bigger. She also hopes that her children continue studying until they become professionals.

loans.use: to buy beverages, crackers, and snacks since her store is near a school.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda works hard to support her family. Erlinda is married and has a buy-and-sell scrap materials business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 12 years now.

Erlinda requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more scrap materials to sell.

Erlinda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more scrap materials to sell

loans.name: El Cumplimiento Group

texts.es: Al grupo solidario El Cumplimiento lo integran tres mujeres trabajadoras que con el fin de incrementar el capital de trabajo y así mejorar sus ingresos, solicitan por primera vez el financiamiento de ADIM para sus negocios. Es coordinado por la señora Claudia que tiene la edad de 27 años y su negocio es la comercialización de mariscos como es pargo rojo, chuleta de pescado, conchas negras, pescado mareño, etc., en diversos departamentos del país, este crédito lo solicita para la compra de dos termos que es donde mantiene los productos, ya que estos le permitirá andar más productos para así abrir nuevos mercados, lo que le ayudará a pagar las cuotas del crédito en el tiempo establecidos. El resto de las integrantes son las señoras, Silvia que tiene la edad de 44 años y se dedica a la venta de frutas en el mercado más populoso de la capital desde hace cinco años, y María de 31 años de edad y tiene una experiencia de doce años en lo que es la comercialización de frutas en el mercado más populoso de la capital.
texts.en: The group 'El Cumplimiento' is made up of 3 hardworking women. They are requesting a loan from ADIM for the first time for their businesses in order to increase working capital and improve their income. The group is coordinated by Claudia, 27, whose business is selling seafood such as red snapper, fish fillets, "conchas negras" (black shells), marine fish, etc., in various of the country's departments. They are requesting this loan to buy 2 thermoses, which are where Claudia keeps her products. These will allow her to have more products so she can open new markets which will help her pay the installment payments in the established time. The rest of the members are Silvia, 44, who has been selling fruit in the most populous market in the capital for 5 years, and María, 31, who has 12 years of experience selling fruit in the most populous market in the capital.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of fish, with the goal of increasing working capital.

loans.name: Bosco

texts.en:
Bosco is a 44 year old married man with 5 children living in Fort Portal Uganda. He sells produce and at the same time rears pigs and birds.

Bosco is faced with a challenge of little capital, which hinders the growth of his business. Besides that, he hopes to construct a residential house.

Bosco needs a loan to rent land for planting.

loans.use: to rent land for planting.

loans.name: Jenny Lucy

texts.es:
Jenny tiene 44 años de edad, es casada, vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en esta comunidad es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral, realiza esta actividad desde hace 10 años contando con experiencia en este negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como cerdos, cuyes, patos, gallinas, entre otros, para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto Jenny espera ofrecer mayor variedad de animales a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ventas y le va a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Jenny is 44 years old, married, and lives in her own home with her husband and two children. They live in a rural zone in the district of Oyotún, located in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the north coast of Peru. Life in this community is tranquil, people here make a living from agriculture, commerce and cattle farming. 

Jenny makes a living raising and selling farm animals, she has been doing this work for the past 10 years. Jenny has plenty of experience in this work and many people have given her personal and professional references in her district.

Jenny seeks a loan to buy animals such as pigs, guinea pigs, ducks and chickens wholesale, in order to expand her business's stock.  

With this loan, Jenny hopes to offer a wider variety of animals to her customers which would positively impact her sales and allow her and her family's quality of life to improve.

loans.use: to buy animals such as pigs, guinea pigs, ducks and chickens wholesale, in order to expand her business's stock.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase poultry.

loans.name: Omorden Bor Group

texts.en:
These ladies are part of the group called Omorden Bor (good effort) and are into charcoal, hair products, footwear, cooked rice and porridge. They have known each other for so many years and are still together, living in the same neighborhood.

Asana is the group representative. She is 43 years old and a tenant in Chorkor. She also attended school to the secondary level. She is single and has no dependent child.

She has been selling charcoal for the past twenty years, and she uses this to take care of the family financially. She is taking this loan amount of GHS 7,700 together with her colleagues, to expand their businesses. She will use her portion to purchase eight more bags of charcoal to sell to her customers. This is her eighth loan cycle.

The group will hold each other responsible for the repayment of the loan.

loans.use: to purchase eight more bags of charcoal to sell to her customers; this is her eighth loan cycle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, beverages, snacks, sweet bread, etc.

loans.name: Nilufar

texts.ru: Это Нилуфар. Ей 34 лет. Она проживает в городе Турсунзаде вместе мужем, братом, сынам и невесткой. Нилуфар добрая и шустрая женщина, которой хорошо исправляется со своей работой. Она шьет женскую одежду. Нилуфар занимается шитьем у себя дома. Ей в работе помогает невестка. У Нилуфар 5 летный опыт работы. Она запрашивает кредит для купли новой швейной машинки «Yamata». Швейная машинка «Yamata» исполняет много функции и помогает ей сшить новую стильную одежду и приобрести много клиентов. Она будет рада благодарна Вам за поддержку. Нилуфар верит в Вас.
texts.en: Nilufar is 34 years old.  She lives in the city of Tursunzoda with her husband, her sons, her brother and sister-in-law.  She is a kind and smart woman who is very skilled at her work.  Nilufar works from home and sews women's clothes.  Her sister-in-law helps her.  Nilufar has five years of experience in this field.  She is taking a loan to buy a new "Yamata" sewing machine with many functions, which will allow her to sew more stylish clothes and attract many customers.  She is very grateful to you and your support.  She relies on you.

loans.use: to buy a "Yamata" sewing machine.

loans.name: Rosa Alba

texts.es:
Rosa, de 50 años de edad, estudio hasta cuarto grado, está casada y su esposo es agricultor, tiene 4 hijos, pero solo uno vive con ellos y trabaja.

Rosa, toda su vida se ha dedicado a los oficios del hogar, ha trabajado en casas ajenas lavando y planchando ropa en su comunidad, su esposo es quien genera el mayor ingreso al hogar. 

El préstamo que está solicitando es para invertir en un negocio nuevo de venta de ropa, ella comprará ropa para mujeres y niños, anteriormente se le otorgó un préstamo para construir un cuarto en su casa, en el cual ahora tiene más espacio y mayor privacidad.

Los sueñas de Rosa son, que el nuevo negocio sea rentable y tener buena salud para continuar ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa, 50, has a 4th grade education. She is married and her husband works in agriculture. She has 4 children, but only one lives with them and works.

All her life, Rosa has dedicated herself to household tasks. She has worked in other people's homes in her community washing and ironing. Her husband is the one who generates the majority of the household income.

The loan Rosa is requesting is to be used for a new business selling clothes. She will buy clothing for woman and children. Previously, she was given a loan to build a room in her house, which now gives her more space and privacy. 

Rosa's dreams are that the new business be profitable and to have good health in order to keep helping her family.

loans.use: to invest in a new business selling clothes.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
La socia Antonia  se sigue dedicando al negocio de crianza de animales, la socia cria cuyes y gallinas, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un lugra donde pueda vender los animales. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cuyes y gallinas y también alimentos para los animales.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Antonia keeps working at her business raising animals. She raises guinea pigs and hens. She has several years' experience in this business and it is going well for her. Her dream is to have a place where she can sell the animals. She is asking for the loan to buy guinea pigs and hens as well as feed for the animals.

She is happy with the loan and committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and hens as well as feed for the animals.

loans.name: Dilfuza

texts.ru: Эту женщину зовут Дилфуза. Она проживает в городке Турсунзаде. Ей исполнилось 38. Дилфуза как многие жители городка занимается шитьем женской одежды. У нее уже есть свои клиенты. Ей в работе нравится ежедневный доход. Дилфуза хочет поменять швейную машинку. Старая машинка хорошо не выполняет свои функции как прежде. По этой причине Дилафруз обратилась за кредитом, для купли машинки, чтобы не потерять источник дохода. Она хочет купить швейную машинку «Yamata». Это машинка имеет много функции. С помощью этой швейной машинке она сможет шить больше одежды и больше зарабатывать. Дилфуза ждет Вашу доброту.
texts.en: Meet Dilfuza.  Dilfuza lives in the city of Tursunzoda and just turned 38.  Like many residents of the same city, she sews women's clothes and has her own customers.  She likes her work for the daily income it brings.  However, she wants to change her sewing machine as her old machine no longer performs its functions.  For this reason, Dilfuza is taking a loan.  This loan will help her to buy a new machine and will allow her not to lose her source of income.  Dilfuza wants to buy a "Yamata" sewing machine with many functions.  Thanks to this new machine, she will be able to sew more clothes and make more money.  She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a "Yamata" sewing machine

loans.name: Willan

texts.es:
Willan tiene 23 años de edad, vive junto a su cónyuge y su hijo de 2 años en casa de material rústico en el distrito de Santo Tomás, una localidad que tiene servicios básicos como luz y agua, su población se dedica a la agricultura, crianza de animales menores, ganado vacuno y comercio, se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de pintado de diversas instituciones y casas de su distrito y caseríos aledaños, brinda este servicio desde hace 4 años por lo que cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales por parte de sus clientes, es solicitado por el buen trabajo que realiza, es un joven emprendedor que también se desempeña como ayudante en construcción de viviendas. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de herramientas como baldes y brochas de pintar para realizar su trabajo así como para realizar mantenimiento de sus actuales herramientas, esto le va a permitir brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que se verá reflejado en su nivel de ingresos y le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Willan is 23 years old and lives with his spouse and his two year old son in a house made of rustic materials in the Santo Tomás district.  The town has basic utilities like electricity and running water, and the citizens work in agriculture, animal husbandry and business.  The district is located in the province of Cutervo, which is part of the Catamarca region in Peru's northern sierra.

Willan works painting various businesses and houses in his district and neighboring villages.  He has worked as a painted for four years and has a lot of experience, and great personal and professional reviews from his customers.  He is sought after for the good work that he does.  He is a hardworking young man who also worked as a home construction assistant.  

The loan will be used to purchase tools such as buckets and paintbrushes for his work as well as to repair some of his current tools.  This will allow him to provide better service to his customers which be result in higher earnings and will allow him to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: purchase tools such as buckets endpoint brushes for his work, as well as to repair some of his current tools.

loans.name: Alimardon

texts.ru:
Алимардону аз района Чилинкуля 27 лет. Он женат. Алимардон вместе с женой живет у родителей. Пока у него нет детей, но он мечтает о них. Он хочет стать хорошим предпринимателем, финансово устойчивым человеком, чтобы его дети городились им, и он мог дать им хорошее образование и обеспечить их всем.
С такими планами Алмардон обратился за кредитом. Он хочет начать новый бизнес. Он планирует выращивать мелко рогатых скотин (барашек) у себя во дворе. Во дворе он имеет коровник, который он подготовил и не много корма. Алимардону только надо помочь приобрести скотин. Если он начнет этот бизнес, он сможет принести в дом постоянный и определенный источник дохода.
texts.en:
Alimardon has been living in the Jilikul district of Tajikistan for the past 27 years.  He is married.  He and his wife live with his parents.  They do not have children yet but would love to have some.  Alimardon wants to be a successful entrepreneur and to be financially stable, so that his children can be proud of him one day, and so that he can provide them with everything and give them a good education.

With all these goals in mind, Alimardon is taking a loan which will help him to start a new business.  He is planning to start raising some small livestock (sheep) at home.  He already has a barn which is ready for livestock, and he also has some animal feed.  The only thing he still needs help with is the purchase of livestock.  With this new business, Alimardon will be able to bring home a stable source of income.

loans.use: to start a new business and buy some young sheep.

loans.name: Celedonia

texts.es:
La socia Celedonia se dedica al negocio de venta de comida, la socia realiza diferentes platos como pollo al horno, sopas y saltados de carne, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, verduras y pollo.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Celedonia works selling meals.  She cooks different dishes such as roasted chicken, soups and beef stir-frys.  She works from 8am to 6pm, and she has 8 years of experience in this business, which has gone very well for her.  Her dream is to have her own restaurant.

Celedonia is seeking a loan to purchase ingredients such as rice, vegetables and chicken.  She is very happy for the loan and she is committed to making the payments on time.

loans.use: purchase ingredients such as rice, vegetables and chicken.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase skirts, dresses, blouses, underwear, etc. to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bananas, yuca and papayas to sell.

loans.name: Mayita Group

texts.es:
Al grupo solidario Mayita lo integran cuatro mujeres esforzadas que día a día buscan la manera de brindarle mejores condiciones de vida a sus familias, cada una con negocios distintos solicitan por segunda ocasión el financiamiento en ADIM para sus negocios. Quien lo coordina es la señora Hilaria una mujer perseverante que a sus 46 años, sale a las calles de la departamento a vender con una pana en su cabeza productos varios como es bananos, papaya, sandía, arroz con leche, atol, cuajadas, etc., y el actual crédito lo solicita para la compra de naranjas dulces, limones, banano, piña, sandías, etc., ya que son productos que a diario se demandan.
El resto de las integrantes son, la señora Aura que tiene la edad de 50 años que se dedica a la comercialización de frutas, verduras y pinol en alguno de los barrios del municipio, se dedica a este negocio desde hace treinta años, la joven Ana que tiene la edad de 22 años y comercializa frutas en uno de los mercados de la capital desde hace dos años, y la señora Petrona de 36 años de edad comercializa especies en diversos departamentos del país.
texts.en:
The Mayita solidarity group is made up of four hardworking women who day to day seek a way to offer their families a better standard of living. Each of them has her different business. They are asking ADIM for a loan for a second time for their businesses. Hilaria is the one coordinating this. She is a persevering woman who at 46 years old goes out on the streets with a cloth on her head to sell various products such as bananas, papayas, watermelon, rice pudding, atole, curds, etc. She is asking for the present loan to buy sweet oranges, lemons, bananas, pineapples, watermelons, etc., because these are the products that are in demand daily. 

The rest of the members are Aura, who is 50 years old.  She sells fruit, vegetables and Pinol cleaner in some of the neighborhoods in town. She has done this business for thirty years. Ana is 22 years old and she has sold fruit on one of the markets in the capital for two years. Petrona, is 36 and sells spices in different departments in the country.

loans.use: to buy sweet oranges, lemons, bananas, pineapples, watermelons, etc., because they are products that are in demand daily.

loans.name: Bacilio

texts.es:
Bacilio tiene 41 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Pomahuaca, una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de frutales y arroz, comercio y ganadería, se encuentra ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú.

El brinda servicio de transporte público en su propia mototaxi trasladando a sus pasajeros a zonas aledañas a su distrito, cuenta con más de 05 años de experiencia en este sector y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de repuestos para su vehículo así como para brindar mantenimiento a este ya que se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Bacilio espera brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le va a generar mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Bacilio is 41 years old. He lives in the district of Pomahuaca, a community with a hot climate. Its population works in agriculture, especially growing fruit and rice, as well as in trade and in cattle raising. It is located in the province of Jaén, which belongs to the Cajamarca region in the northern sierra of Peru.

He offers a public transportation service in his own motorcycle taxi, transporting his passengers to areas close to his district. He has more than 5 years' experience in this area and good personal and work references in his district. He has asked for a loan to buy replacement parts for his vehicle as well as to do maintenance on it because it is in poor condition. With this, Bacilio hopes to offer his customers a better service which will generate more income and therefore improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts for his vehicle as well as do maintenance on it because it is in poor condition.

loans.name: Santos Irene

texts.es:
Santos, de 30 años de edad, está acompañado, estudio hasta cuarto grado de educación básica, su compañera de vida se dedica a la pesca artesanal.

Santos, desde hace cinco años trabaja durante el día como motorista de algunas personas vecinas y por la noche, se dedica a la pesca con su cuñado.

Santos, necesita el dinero para comprar de hierro y lámina para ponerle a su casa, ya que la casa donde vive actualmente está muy deteriorada y tiene mucho miedo por su familia.

Santos, desea que su hijo sea profesional, ya que él está dispuesto a apoyarlo para que se supere.
texts.en:
Santos is 30 years old and has a fourth grade education.  His live-in partner is a fisherwoman who uses traditional methods.

For the past five years, Santos has been working as a driver for various neighbors during the day.  At night, he fishes with his brother-in-law.

Santos needs money to buy iron and sheet metal for his house, because the house where he currently lives is in disrepair and he is very afraid for his family.

Santos wants his son to be professional now that he is willing to support him so that he can better himself.

loans.use: to buy iron and sheet metal for his house.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth es una mujer emprendedora que tiene la edad de 33 años, y solicita por segunda ocasión el financiamiento en ADIM para su negocio, ella comercializa quesillo en las afueras de la alcaldía de la municipalidad, cuenta con la experiencia de dieciséis años en la comercialización, y solicita el crédito para la compra de cebollas, vinagre, queso quesillo, crema, gaseosas, bolsas, etc., ya que este es uno de los productos tradicionales en el país.
texts.en: Elizabeth, 33, is an enterprising woman and is requesting the financing from ADIM for her business the second time.  She sells fresh cheese outside the town hall of the municipality.  She has 16 years of experience in these sales and she is asking for this loan in order to buy onions, vinegar, fresh cheese, cream, soft drinks, bags, etc., since this is one of the traditional products of the country.

loans.use: to buy onions, vinegar, fresh cheese, cream, etc.

loans.name: Vanessa

texts.es:
La socia Vanessa  se dedica al negocio de crianza de animales, la socia cria cuyes y gallinas, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere poner su tienda de abarrotes ya que es su sueño tener su propio negocio, la socia también quiere tener un lugar más amplio para que pueda vender sus animales. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cuyes y gallinas y también alimentos para los animales.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Vanesa makes a living raising animals. 

She raises guinea pigs and hens. Through this business, she wants to set up a grocery store because her dream is to have her own business. She also wants to have a larger place where she can sell her animals.

Vanessa is requesting a loan to buy guinea pigs, hens, and feed for the animals too.

She is happy about the loan and is committed to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase guinea pigs, hens, and also feed for her animals.

loans.name: Dilshod

texts.ru: Дилшод мужчина 35 лет, женат, отец пятерых детей. Он окончил 9 классов средней школы и поступил в техникум.Там обучился слесарному делу и начал работать слесарем у себя в деревне.Так же Дилшод на накопленные деньги решил открыть свой бизнес. Он начал заниматься животноводством. У него в стаде 10 баранов, которые он откармливает и продает, а взамен покупает новых баранов по дешевле. У Дилшода большая семья , и он трудится в поте лица, чтобы прокормить их. Дилшод хочет увеличить поголовье своего скота,но на данный момент у него нет нужной суммы. Поэтому он обратился в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой. Заранее благодарит за поддержку.
texts.en: Dilshod is 35 years old, married, and the father of five children.  He completed 9 years of secondary school before enrolling in a technical college where he was trained as a metal worker.  He then started working as a locksmith in his own village.  With the money saved from this job, he decided to start his own business and got involved in animal husbandry.  His herd currently comprises 10 sheep which he fattens and resells, before buying new sheep at a lower price.  Dilshod has a large family and he works really hard to support them.  He wants to increase his livestock headcount, but at the moment he doesn't have enough money to do so.  For this reason, he has turned to MDO Arvand and asked for financial support.  He thanks you in advance for your help.

loans.use: to increase his livestock headcount.

loans.name: Abdumajid

texts.ru: Абдумачид мужчина 55 лет ,женат ,отец шестерых детей и дедушка двадцати внуков.Он родился в сельской местности и после окончания школы начал заниматься животноводством. Он мечтал поступить в университет,но у его родителей не было денег ,поэтому он так и не получил высшего образования.В возрасте 20 лет Абдумачид женился и после рождения детей ему пришлось пойти работать на стройке,чтобы прокормить свою семью.Сейчас  у него участок земли,на котором он пасет домашних животных.ОН откармливает жтвотных и продает их на рынке.Абдумачид хочет увеличить поголовье своего скота ,но ему не хватает денег.Поэтому он обратился в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой.Он заранее благодарит за доверие.
texts.en: Abdumajid is 55 years old and married.  He is the father of six children and the grandfather of 20 grandchildren.  He was born in the countryside and got involved in animal husbandry right after finishing school.  He had dreamed of attending college but his parents didn't have enough money, so for this reason, Abdumajid never received a higher education.  He got married when he was 20.  After his children were born, he had to find work in construction in order to feed his family.  He currently owns a small plot of land on which he raises livestock.  He fattens his animals and then resells them at the market.  Abdumajid would like to increase his livestock headcount, but he doesn't have the financial means to do so.  For this reason, he has turned to MDO Arvand for financial assistance.  He thanks you in advance for your trust and support.

loans.use: to increase his livestock headcount.

loans.name: Farzona

texts.ru: Фарзона ответственная и верующая жена и сестра. Она умелая мастерица. Ей 26 лет. У нее пока нет детей, но она мечтает о них. Фарзона домохозяйка. Она на отлично справляется с домашними делами и у нее также остается времени заниматься шитьем. Фарзона в течение 4,5 года у себя дома представляет услуги портнихи. За столь время она набралась большого опыта. Фарзона хочет купить профессиональную швейную машинку, чтобы шить на профессиональном уровне. Благодаря этой машинке она сможет получать больше заказов и шить гораздо быстрее. Но на приобретения машинку ее мечты у нее не хватает денег, и она обратилась за кредитом.
texts.en: Farzona is a responsible and trusting wife and sister.  She is 26 years old and a skilled seamstress.  She doesn't have any children yet but she would very much like to have some.  Farzona is a homemaker.  She takes very good care of her household and in her spare time, she works as a seamstress from home.  She has been involved in this activity for four and a half years.  Over the years, she has acquired a great deal of experience.  She wants to buy a professional sewing machine, so that she can truly offer professional services.  Thanks to her new machine, she will be able to get more orders and to work quite faster.  Unfortunately, she doesn't have enough money to purchase the sewing machine of her dreams, and for this reason, she is taking a loan.

loans.use: to buy a new professional sewing machine.

loans.name: Jose Huberth

texts.es:
Jose Huberth es soltero, tiene 29 años de edad. Vive en casa familiar con madre y hermanos, hace más de 20 años. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería que se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Zaña, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado vacuno, cerdos y a la venta de leche fresca, realiza esta actividad desde hace más de 03 años aproximadamente y cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales por parte de sus clientes. El crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales así como para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento del lugar donde los cría (corrales), con esto el espera poder venderlos a un mejor precio dado que los animales estarán en mejor calidad; lo que le generará mayores ingresos, mejores ganancias y por ende una mejora en su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jose Huberth is single. He is 29 years old. He has lived in the family home with his mother and his siblings for more than 20 years. He lives in a community that works in commerce, agriculture, and livestock raising and is located in the Zaña district in the province of Chiclayo in the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru.

He raises and sells cattle and pigs and sells fresh milk. He has been doing this work for more than 3 years, approximately, and he has good work and personal references from his customers. The loan will be for the purchase of a larger quantity of animals as well as to make repairs and do maintenance on the place where he raises them (pens). With this, he hopes to be able to sell them at a better price, given that the animals will be of better quality. This will generate better income for him, better earnings, and in the end an improvement in his quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of animals as well as to make repairs and maintain the pens where he raises them.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pigs to sell

loans.name: Al Salim Group

texts.en:
Ghania is the featured borrower of Al Salim group. She and the other group members decided to stand side by side and acquire a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, because they have always been neighbors and friends and they trust each other, and they work hard to develop their living.

Ghania is a 54-year-old married mother of five children who has worked hard preparing special handmade souvenirs for eight years now. She is getting a lot of attention in her neighborhood; that is why she has to develop her work and production so that she can spread her creations farther away than her neighborhood. 

With her acquired loan, Ghania will be capable of buying the necessary threads, beads and pieces for her new-release collection which she intends to prepare for the coming spring and summer seasons. In this way she will be capable of participating in several exhibitions in nearby villages that will help in promoting her production widely.

Ghania is the lady at the far-right side of the picture. As for the other group members, Dalal is at the center, while Hiba is the first lady at the far-left side of the picture.

loans.use: To buy the necessary threads, beads and pieces for her new-release collection which she intends to prepare for the coming spring and summer seasons

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 41 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by raising livestock in the Philippines. Evelyn is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies for her livestock.

Evelyn has been raising livestock for five years and also earns additional income from buying and selling ready-to-wear.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies for her livestock

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en:
Hello lenders. Meet Hellen, a very industrious, honest and hardworking woman from the Nkubu area of Kenya. Hellen, 59 , has been farming for the past 20 years. Through these years, she has gathered much experience and is considered among the best farmers in her village. She has been practicing mixed farming. Her primary sources of income have been milk, eggs, crops and some small business ventures that help her make ends meet. Hellen is very passionate about farming and loves cultivating her farm. That is why, every day, she wakes up very early to go to her farm to plow. 

Although she makes profits from farming, she is not comfortable and has always wanted to increase her income by selling cereals. That is why she is seeking this loan to buy cereals. Kenya's Nkubu area, one of the county's populated regions, has a high demand for cereals. This means that Hellen could increase her profits and satisfy the demand that is there. 

Accessing funds has been a challenge for Hellen, but she now feels relieved because Juhudi Kilimo is partnering with Kiva lenders to help aspiring women farmers like her turn their farming dreams into reality through training and loan financing. Hellen believes that this loan will be of much help, and that she will be able to satisfy the demand for cereals. She also believes that the extra income she earns will enable a permanent change in her life and increase her business. Increased profits will allow Hellen to repay this loan and secure the future of her school-going children.

loans.use: To buy cereals

loans.name: Giberta

texts.en:
Giberta is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business. Giberta has been in this business for five years. Giberta earns more income from retailing rice.

Giberta has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a married woman but has no child. She lives at a rental house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For the past four years, she has operated a cereals shop business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. Her potential customers are neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. Mariam dreams of establishing a wholesale cereals shop business in the future. 

With the loan that she is requesting of 40,000 KES, she wants to purchase stock of wheat flour, maize flour, beans and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of wheat flour, maize flour, beans and wheat flour

loans.name: Gülşen

texts.en:
Gulsen is divorced and has one child. She is making and selling mantı (Turkish ravioli).  With this loan she bought ingredients to make mantı and earned money from the mantı that she sold. She plans to open a shop.  She earned to support her family. She is planning to provide a better future for her children.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Gülşen hanım bir çocuk annesi, eşinden ayrı evinden mantı yapıp satarak geçimini sağlıyor.  Aldığı kredi ile mantı malzemesi aldı, üretip satarak para kazanmak istiyor.  Hedefi  dükkan açmak istiyor.  Onların da aile ekonomilerine katkı sağlamasını istiyor.  Çocuğuna iyi bir gelecek sağlamak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make mantı (Turkish ravioli)

loans.name: Nader

texts.en:
Nader is a 23-year-old single man who lives with his family in Sana'a city, Yemen. He studied until the Secondary education and now he is an employee in a private sector for a small salary. He helps his father in covering a lot of his family expenses. Nader is a very responsible and active young man who works hard in order to provide his family with better living conditions. 

Nader has a very old mobile phone which does not work well and it is broken down. Nader decided to change it with a new stylish Galaxy mobile phone but his salary is not sufficient to do that. For this reason, Nader applied for a loan of  YER 125,000 from AMB in order to purchase a new mobile phone to connect with other people. Nader hopes to  enroll in the University to complete his studies.

loans.use: To purchase a new mobile phone to connect with other people.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy plastic waste and resell to sachet water production companies to produce sachet drinking water

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
For the last five years Jane has been operating a fruit and vegetable stall in the outskirts of Narok town in Kenya. She learned about Visionfund Kenya from a loan officer who was conducting a marketing campaign in her area. Jane has been in this business for nine years and earns a monthly income of approximately 11,000 KES.

She has acquired a first loan of 30,000 KES, which will help her to purchase more fresh fruit and vegetables from farmers. 

Buying in bulk has proven to be cheaper and enables her to earn more income. She will use the proceeds to repay her loan. Her dream is to own some rental houses.

loans.use: to buy more fruit and vegetables for resale

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business. Jennifer has been in this business for 15 years. Jennifer earns more income from selling ready to wear.

Jennifer has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is 41 years old and married with three children. With two children currently in school, Marilou works very hard to provide for them. Marilou runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell in her general store. Marilou has been in this business for 21 years and sells a variety of items such as soft drinks, canned goods, shampoo, coffee, sugar, cereals, etc. 

In the future, Marilou would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Gülcan

texts.en:
Gülcan is married and a mother to 2 children. She has a business selling hairdresser supplies. 

When she graduated from university Gülcan started marketing hairdressing equipment. Then, after she had saved enough money, she opened her own store.  

Gülcan benefited from the help of microcredit loans and was able to earn more income. Now, she would like to keep earning more by receiving a 3rd microcredit loan. She plans use this loan to purchase hairdressing equipment. 

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 

Gülcan hanım evli iki çocuk annesi.  Kuaför malzemeleri satışı yapıyor.  Üniversiteyi bitirdikten sonra kuaför malzemelerinin pazarlamasını yaparak başlamış.  Para biriktirerek dükkan açmış.  Mikro kredinin kadınlar için verdiği imkanlardan faydalanmak istemiş.  Kuaför malzemeleri alarak güzel paralar kazanmış.  Üçüncü krediyi çekerek kuaför malzemesi almış ve güzel paralar kazanmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy hairdressing equipment.

loans.name: Nisel

texts.en:
Nisel is 38 years old and has 3 children. She is married, and all of her 3 children are in school.

Nisel is in the agriculture business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She has requested a 12,000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation in order to purchase additional livestock, vitamins, and other supplies for her business.

Nisel has been raising livestock for 3 years now, and she has borrowed 7 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Nisel would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock, vitamins, and other supplies for her business.

loans.name: Gülcan

texts.en:
Separated from her husband, Gülcan lives with her son. She worked as a beautician for eight years, but her business did not progress as she had hoped it would.  

So Gülcan decided to continue the family business in the dairy industry. She opened a small dairy shop, where she has been working for four years. She would like to use the loan she has requested to buy milk, yogurt, and cheese products which she will sell.  

Gülcan's goal is to provide a good future for her son.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 

Gülcan hanım eşinden ayrı bir oğlu ile beraber yaşıyor.  Güzellik uzmanı olarak sekiz yıl çalışmış.  İşleri istediği gibi iyi gitmemiş.  Baba mesleği olan mandıracılık yapmaya karar vermiş.  Küçük bir dükkan açmış ve dört yıldır bu işi yapıyor.   Aldığı kredi ile süt yoğurt peynir ürünleri aldı.  Satarak para kazanmak istiyor.  Oğluna iyi bir gelecek hazırlamak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy milk, yogurt, and cheese products.

loans.name: Jhony Miguel

texts.es:
Jhony tiene 28 años de edad, es soltero, vive con su familia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y crianza de animales principalmente.

El se dedica a brindar los servicios de transporte en un vehículo móvil, cuenta con más de 5 años de experiencia en el negocio y con buenas referencias por parte de los habitantes de su distrito. Solicita préstamo para invertir en cursos de actualización en educación vial así como para realizar mantenimiento del vehículo, dicha inversión le servirá para mejorar la calidad de sus servicios y así poder atender las diversas necesidades de los pasajeros, lo que le generará mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jhony is 28 years old, is single, and lives with his family in a rural area in the district of Oyotún, which is located in the province of Chiclayo, in the region of Lambayeque, in the northern coast of Peru. The inhabitants of this district make a living mainly by working the land, trading, and rearing animals.

He makes a living offering transportation services using a motor vehicle. He has over five years of experience in the business and has good references from the people living in his district.  

He is requesting a loan to invest in a refresher course on road safety education and to perform maintenance on the vehicle. Such investment will help him to improve the quality of his services and meet the many needs of his passengers, which will allow him to generate more income and, therefore, improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in a refresher course on road safety education as well as to perform maintenance on the vehicle.

loans.name: Merry Crest

texts.en:
Merry Crest is 30 years old and married with two children. She earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Merry Crest has been in pig fattening for 10 years and also earns additional income from food vending. She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream, to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase tricycle for rubbish and plastic waste collection

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is married with two school going children. They live at their own house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

She has operated a business selling khangas  (women’s wrap cloths) from her home and door-to-door to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of lack of capital to expand her business. With the loan of 50,000 KES she is requesting, she wants to purchase bales of khangas to sell. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of khangas to sell.

loans.name: Gülser

texts.en:
Gulser is single.  She is a beautician.  She and her friend started a partnership business in 2008,  but later on she continued to work by herself.  Right now she is employing two more women.  She wanted to benefit from the advantages that micro loans provide for women.  She bought equipment for her business and earned good money.  With the second credit she bought more equipment and wants to earn more.
Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Gülser hanım bekar güzellik uzmanı bu işe 2008 son aylarında iki arkadaş olarak başlamış.  Daha sonra arkadaşından ayrılarak kendisi devam etmiş.  Yanında iki kişi çalıştırıyor.  Daha sonra mikro kredinin kadınlara verdiği imkanlardan faydalanmak istemiş.   İşyerine malzeme almış ve bunların karşılığında güzel paralar kazanmış.  İkinci aldığı kredi ile dükkana malzeme aldı ve para kazanmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy equipment for her beauty salon

loans.name: Samwela

texts.en:
Samwela is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a charcoal vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy more sacks of charcoal to sell to her customers for her charcoal vending business.

Samwela has been in this business for four years. She earns more income from selling lumber.

Samwela has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of charcoal to sell to her customers

loans.name: Hale

texts.en:
Hale is married with four children.  She has been a hairdresser for five years.  She began working as an apprentice.  When her children were young, it was difficult to look after them, but now that they are older it is easier to work.  She’ll use the loan to buy products for her salon and increase her sales.  Her goal is to ensure a good future for her children.  

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 

Hale hanım evli dört çocuk annesi.  Kuaför beş yıldır bu işi yapıyor.  Kuaför yanında çırak olarak bu işe başlamış.  Çocukları küçük yaşlarda iken onların bakımında zorlanmış.  Çocuklar büyüdükçe bakımı daha kolay hale gelmiş ve işleri de kolaylaşmaya başlamış.  Aldığı kredi ile kuaför dükkanına malzeme aldı ve satışlarını artırmayı düşünüyor.  Çocuklarına iyi bir gelecek hazırlamayı hedefliyor.

loans.use: to buy products for her salon

loans.name: Oksid

texts.en:
Oksid is 29 years old. He is a master who repairs car and auto parts . He has been in this business for four years.  

Oksid is married and has a child, and he lives with his parents. Oksid’s family live in Fuzuli region but for 22 years already  they are IDP (Internally Displaced Persons) from Fuzuli city. 

Oksid has applied to Komak organization for a loan in the amount of 1,350 AZN to buy new materials and tools, which are useful in his business. 

He is thankful to Komak and Kiva for help. In the future he wants to recruit an assistant and build a house for his family.

loans.use: to buy materials and tools for his repair work

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
Zenaida is a married mother of 7 children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 53 years old, and 4 of her children are still in school.

Zenaida has a general store business in the Philippines. She has requested a 10,000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation in order to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Zenaida has been running her business for 1 year now. In the future, she would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Nisel

texts.en:
Nisel is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Nisel is 29 years old and has two children who are in school.

She has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. Nisel requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell to her customers.

Nisel has been in this business for one year. In the future, Nisel would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice to sell to her customers

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
“When women come together, they are powerful,” says Emily, a 36-year-old farmer who lives in the village of Londiani in the Litein area of Kenya. For the past year, Emily has been actively involved in mixed farming. Because she is from rural Kenya, gender roles still adhere and women do the heavy work of fetching and carrying water and wood, in addition to household chores, childcare and tending crops. This has not been a setback because Emily has been making great profits with dairy and crop farming. 

Kericho is one of the places with conditions that favor horticulture farming: good climate, soils, transport system, and a market. Emily has always wanted to diversify and start horticultural farming, but the biggest challenge she has been facing is lack of funds. She is therefore requesting a loan to start horticultural farming. 

With Tulwap Tolletge self-help group, whose members co-guarantee each other to secure a loan, Emily joined Juhudi Kilimo, a micro-finance organization that supports young and enterprising farmers. With your loan Emily intends to buy good quality vegetable seeds, flowers and potatoes. Proximity to an airstrip will allow her to transport the produce faster to an international market, hence enabling her to make more money. This loan will improve Emily's living conditions and secure the future of her children.

loans.use: to start horticulture farming.

loans.name: Crusade Group

texts.en:
The group Crusade is composed of five women, who average 45 years of age and three children each. They all live in traditional families in Chorkor-Accra. The women know one another through ties of kinship, community, and friendship. They do commerce in plastic products, fruits, tea, minerals, charcoal, groundnut paste and lining. The women of the group Crusade are on their third loan. To meet the enormous demand from their customers, they turned to the microfinance institution ID-Ghana. These funds will be used to purchase their merchandise as cited above. 

This client, Harriet, is the second person standing at the left. She is currently selling lining and groundnut paste. She intends to purchase lining and groundnut paste from the market to sell to customers in her kiosk. Sales are made by retail to a mixed customer base in Accra. She plans on making a good profit from this loan, that will be used to cover the family's day-to-day expenses, and she plans to save a part.

loans.use: to purchase lining and groundnut paste from the market to sell to customers in her kiosk.

loans.name: Nesrin

texts.en:
Nesrin is a widow and a mother of two.  For two years she has done multi-level marketing.  The beginning years were difficult because she didn't have capital.  

Making use of the opportunities provided by micro-loans for women, she bought products and earned good money from them.  With her second loan she would like to do the same.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 

Nesrin Hanımın iki çocuğu var, eşi vefat etmiş.  Network sistemi yapıyor.  İki yıldır bu işi yapıyor.  Başladığı yıllarda sermayesi olmadığı için zorluk çekmiş.  Mikro kredinin kadınlara verdiği imkanlardan faydalanarak ürün almış.  Bunların karşılığında güzel paralar kazanmış.  İkinci aldığı krediyle de ürün aldı ve güzel paralar kazanmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy products

loans.name: Zehra

texts.en:
Zehra is single and lives with her family.  She works as a hairdresser and at the city market.  

She began working when she was 12 and began working full time when she earned her certification as a hairdresser.  

She also does multi-level marketing, selling health and beauty products to support herself.  When she heard about microloans for women she was interested.  She used it to buy multi-level marketing products and make her work easier.  She believes her second loan will facilitate her work.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 

Zehra hanım bekar ailesi ile beraber yaşıyor.  Kuaför ve pazarlamacı.  İş hayatına on iki yaşında başlamış hem okumuş hem de çalışmış.  On yedi yaşında liseyi bitirdikten sonra tamamen çalışma hayatına başlamış.  Kuaförlükle ilgili diplomalarını tamamlamış.  Birde network sistemi yapıyor.  Yaptığı ürün sağlık ve güzellik açısından kendisine maddi anlamda destek veriyor.  Kadınlara destek veren mikro kredi ile tanışmış ve faydalanmak istemiş.  Network ürünü almış ve işini kolaylaştırmada yardımcı olmuş.  İkinci krediyi de kullanarak işini kolaylaştırmasını düşünüyor.

loans.use: to buy health and beauty products

loans.name: Inga

texts.en:
Inga is a 45-year-old married woman, from the Telavi district. She lives with her husband, son, and daughter-in-law. Her husband and son are artisans and receive small monthly incomes, that are really hardly enough to meet even their basic needs. So the family lives in poverty and requires additional income to cover all daily expenses. 

Inga requested a loan from local financial institutions and was rejected several times, as the creditors didn't find enough family income to be sufficient to approve the loan. The start-up program that is a joint initiative between Kiva and Credo, enabled rural poor like Inga to get the chance to start or re-start businesses. 

So Inga has been approved for the loan of 6,000 GEL for opening a market. She will purchase a stock of food products and all the needed materials to open a market. Inga will work as a sales lady there and she will do her best to run the market. Inga will be able to get a profit that will be significant for her poor family.

loans.use: to open a market

loans.name: Sipora

texts.en:
Sipora is 40 years old and married. She supports two children, ages 13 and 2 years old. She sells secondhand clothes and shoes in the Euro Ekure area of Narok. She has been running the business for eight years, earning a monthly income of KES 10,000.

She has borrowed a second loan of KES 60,000 from Visionfund Kenya. With the loan funds she intends to purchase more shoes to sell. The anticipated profits will be used to pay school fees for her school-going child. Her dreams are to improve her living standards and to own her residential plot of land.

loans.use: to purchase more secondhand clothes and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.en:
Mercedes works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening. Mercedes is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food vending business.

Mercedes has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Anzhela

texts.en:
Anzhela is from Artashat town where she lives with her son. 

She is involved in livestock keeping and in land cultivation. Anzhela currently keeps five cows and twenty hens and cultivates tomato, pepper, eggplant, and watermelon. To be able to improve her farming business, Anzhela ask lenders to support her with this loan. She needs that to purchase seeds (tomato, watermelon, eggplant and pepper) and fertilizer and to hire workers for organizing cultivation works. 

She has already taken a loan from a local financial institution before, but unfortunately wasn't able to pay it back. However, thanks to the hard work during the recent times, Anzhela was able to run her agribusiness in a sustainable way, ensuring that she will be able to cover the monthly payments. So, she has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The second-chance loan program provides loans to people who have a bad credit history and have no access to credit products.

loans.use: to hire workers for organizing cultivation works,and also to purchase seeds (tomato, watermelon, eggplant and pepper) and fertilizer

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Rosemary is a thirty-eight-year-old hardworking widowed mother of five children living in Kasese, Uganda. 

Rosemary is a teacher by profession and has been teaching for eighteen years. She joined the teaching profession because she lacked the money needed for her to pursue advanced education. 

Rosemary also practices farming, growing crops such as cotton and maize, among others, to supplement her low salary. 

Rosemary has the dream of educating her children to the university level. She is requesting a loan to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to pay the school fees for her children.

loans.name: Güngör

texts.en:
Güngör is married and has three children.  She and her husband were making and selling dairy products.  Years ago they collected milk and cheese from villages and sold them in their neighborhood.  They saved their money and opened a store.  She has applied for microcredit.  She is planning to buy products to sell and make money with the help of the loan.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 

Güngör hanım evli üç çocuk annesi.  Eşi ile beraber mandıracılık yapmış.  Yıllar önce bu işe başladığında köylerden süt, peynir toplamış.  Mahallede insanlara satarak para kazanmış ve para biriktirerek dükkan açmış.  Mikro kredinin imkanlarından faydalanarak kredi kullanmış.  Dükkana mal alarak para kazanmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy products to sell.

loans.name: Mirsad

texts.en:
Mirsad is 25 years old and single, living with his parents. He is the main source of income for his family, and he works very hard at his employment, making furniture, sofas, beds, tables, chairs and other household pieces. He continues his work after hours from his workshop at home for contract and commissioned fees. He has a lot of clients and requests for his work, which keeps him very busy and satisfied. 

Now, he is requesting a loan in order to purchase materials for his work. His goal is to build a factory and large space for his furniture and business. He is very optimistic that he will have success and reach this goal based on his current client base and workmanship. He promises to pay on time and is thankful to all of the Kiva lenders for their support.

loans.use: to purchase materials for his work making furniture, sofas, beds, tables, chairs and other household pieces.

loans.name: Sidwata 05 Sapone Group

texts.fr:
Mr OUSMANE représente le groupe SIDWATA 05 SAPONE. Marié, il est père de 05enfants. Le plus âgé a 23ans et le moins âgé a 01an. 04 vont à l’école. Il a 07personnes en charge.
Mr fait l’élevage depuis 22ans. Il s’approvisionne dans les villages environnants.
Il veut s’acheter 03 porcs.
Mr veut réinvestir ses bénéfices dans son activité. Il ambitionne assurer la scolarité des enfants.
texts.en:
Mr. Ousmane represents the Sidwata 05 Sapone group. He is married and has five children. His youngest child is less than a year old and his eldest child is 23 years old. Four of his children go to school. He has seven dependents. 

He has been raising livestock for 22 years. He buys his animals in the neighboring villages. He would like to buy three pigs. 

He would like to reinvest his earnings in his business. He would like to secure his children's education.

loans.use: buy three pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer for foliar feeding.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda works hard to support her family. She is married and has a retailing rice selling business in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for 14 years now.

Erlinda has requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Erlinda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Arif

texts.en:
Arif is the father of 7 children, living in a small village in the southern part of Kosovo. He is involved in the agricultural business and he is very satisfied with his work. 

Arif earns a living by selling cows he has raised, and selling milk and other dairy products. He is requesting a loan in order to purchase another milk cow. 

His goal is to increase his number of cows and to expand his farm, resulting in higher profits and more business. He hopes that this loan will be a key factor towards reaching that goal. 

He is grateful for this opportunity and he wants to thank all of the lenders for their support.

loans.use: to purchase another milk cow.

loans.name: Gladness

texts.en:
Gladness is a 49-year-old single mother of two girls, aged 25 and 12. 

Her entrepreneurial spirit prompted Gladness to sell her small liquor business and venture into farming, specifically, horticulture. This turned out to be a lucrative gamble, as she has rapidly created a market for her products.  As a result, she is able to provide for her family and educate her girls.  In fact, her oldest daughter recently earned a degree in agriculture and is determined to help her mother take the farm to the next level.

Gladness is requesting a loan to buy a windmill. The farming community within her area does not have stable access to water, relying on vendors who sell water at a high price. This has had considerable cost implications and has greatly impacted their revenue. 

Gladness already took initiative and dug a well, and now only needs the windmill to pump water from the well. She decided to use a windmill to take advantage of wind as a natural, renewable resource that does not have the negative impacts on the environment compared to generators or other mechanical pumps.

She believes that by securing a stable water source, the farm will cut down on costs while simultaneously improving on productivity. Water will not only boost her farm but benefit her community by providing clean water for other's domestic use.

loans.use: to buy  a windmill.

loans.name: Iris Madahí

texts.es:
Iris, de 25 años de edad, estudio bachillerato opción contador, está soltera y no  tiene hijos, solo vive con su madre.

Iris, tiene un cafetín en la escuela de su comunidad, su madre le ayuda a preparar la venta todos los días.- 

Iris, desde muy pequeña le ha ayudado a su vecina a hacer pupusas por la tarde y por la mañana vende frescos, pupusas y muchos antojitos en la escuela.

Iris, necesita el dinero para comprar aceite, papas, yuca y preparación para las pupusas.

Su sueño es conocer otros países, pero su mayor sueño es tener un negocio grande o encontrar un trabajo de su profesión ya que es contador.
texts.en: Iris, age 25, studied at a commercial high school with emphasis in accounting. She is single with no children, and she lives with her mother. Iris has a small snack bar at the local school in her community, her mother helps her with the daily sales. Since she was a small child, Iris helped her neighbor make pupusas in the afternoon and sell drinks, pupusas and other treats in the morning. Iris needs the loan to buy cooking oil, potatoes, cassava and spices for the pupusas. She dreams of visiting other countries, but her biggest dream is go have a big business or to find a job in her profession as she is an accountant.

loans.use: To buy cooking oil, potatoes, cassava, and spices for pupusas

loans.name: Douglas

texts.en:
Douglas is a 60-year-old hardworking man with seven children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has operated a mobile money shop business for three years now. He also owns rentals and earns a salary as additional income. 

He has a dream of expanding his business to other busy centers in order to explore the available market and harvest huge returns. However, he is faced with the challenge of limited capital. 

He is requesting a loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Rosa Candida

texts.es:
Rosa, de 25 años de edad, estudio hasta cuarto grado, está acompañada, aun no tiene hijos.

Rosa, trabaja en una tienda vecina desde hace unos meses, tiene ganado y una parcela en la que tiene una finca de marañón.

Rosa, necesita el crédito para pagar mano de obra que recoja la semilla de marañón para comercializarla.

Rosa, sueña con tener un bebe, al cual quiere darle todo su amor y tiempo.
